lines.text: Well... maybe he was trying to get that goat's trust.
Yeah! Y'know, mountain goats will climb up rocky cliff faces to get at the salt deposits.
By disguising himself as a mountain, he might've been trying to lure the goat to himself!
After all, they crave that min-
Can't let you do that, Star Seeker.
No. It's a played-out meme from 2014, and I won't have it obstructing this police investigation.
Come on! Everyone loves outdated memes in video games!
Kid, this setting don't even have the internet. Or a calendar year 2014. It's clumsy and forces us into this.
Everyone loves fourth wall humor, too!
Some poor player probably had some real clever idea for how the goat explains the concrete bath, and we're wastin' their valuable time.
Well, no, the idea was asinine, but still.
(It's not worth calling him on his Star Fox reference.)
